statements: SELECT customer_id, social_media_platform, engagement_level, last_interaction_date FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT social_media_platform, last_interaction_date, customer_id, engagement_level FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_level FROM social_media_engagement WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT social_media_platform, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM social_media_engagement GROUP BY social_media_platform;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, social_media_platform FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, social_media_platform, engagement_level FROM social_media_engagement WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY last_interaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT social_media_platform FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, last_interaction_date FROM social_media_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'Low' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE channel = 'Email' ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_engagements FROM engagements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_engagements > 3;
SELECT c.name, e.channel FROM customers c JOIN engagements e ON c.id = e.customer_id WHERE e.channel = 'Email' ORDER BY e.engagement_time DESC;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(e.engagement_id) AS num_engagements FROM customers c LEFT JOIN engagements e ON c.id = e.customer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY num_engagements DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email='example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM social_media_channels WHERE channel_type='Twitter';
SELECT customer_name, channel_name, engagement_time FROM customers JOIN customer_engagement ON customers.customer_id = customer_engagement.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM social_media_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, engagement_time, engagement_type FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_engagement ON customers.customer_id = customer_engagement.customer_id WHERE engagement_type='Feedback' ORDER BY engagement_time ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Like';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.platform_name, ce.engagement_type FROM customers c JOIN customer_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id JOIN social_media_platforms s ON ce.platform_id = s.platform_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, eh.engagement_details FROM customers c JOIN customer_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id JOIN engagement_history eh ON ce.interaction_id = eh.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_channels WHERE platform='Twitter';
SELECT customer_name, email, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_description FROM custom_strategies ORDER BY strategy_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.channel_name, e.engagement_datetime FROM customers c JOIN customer_engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id JOIN social_media_channels s ON e.channel_id = s.channel_id WHERE e.engagement_type = 'advertisement' ORDER BY e.engagement_datetime DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, em.reach, em.likes, em.shares FROM customers c JOIN customer_engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id JOIN engagement_metrics em ON e.engagement_id = em.engagement_id WHERE em.reach > 1000 AND em.likes > 50 AND em.shares > 10;
SELECT c.customer_name, cs.strategy_description, cs.strategy_date FROM customers c JOIN custom_strategies cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id WHERE cs.strategy_date = CURDATE();
